DataElement.preferredName: Patient Receive Device Prior To Protocol Therapy Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to a patient receiving a device prior to protocol therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Receive Device Prior To Protocol Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures._To take, accept, or get something offered._An object contrived for a specific purpose._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Concepts.definition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Property.preferredName: Receive Device Prior To Protocol Therapy
Property.preferredDefinition: To take, accept, or get something offered.:An object contrived for a specific purpose.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.
An object contrived for a specific purpose.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
